volume_group.description: The name of the volume group

logical_volume.description: The name of the logical_volume to mount

mountpoint.description: Where to mount the logical volume

fstype.description: The mount type. Valid values depend on the operating system. This is a required option.

options.description: A single string containing options for the mount, as they would appear in fstab on Linux. For many platforms this is a comma-delimited string

atboot.description: Whether to mount the mount at boot. Not all platforms support this.
